name: Imminent Threat
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, theme "Out of Control".

Take control of your craft as you attempt to destroy the planet! 

Utilize your control board to move your ship, as well as fire bullets and bombs!  If you run low on fuel or ammo, hold the refuel or reload buttons to restock and replenish.

(game just played with mouse, no keyboard or controllers)

Fair warning, your systems can go a little haywire if you get hit!

All assets created by me specifically for this jam.  That explains why the music is so bad.  Sorry.  Lucky for you I was gracious enough to add a button to stop it.  Feel free to save your ears from the agony of the loop.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Angry-Armadillo-Games-108587560925658
